ISSUE.TITLE: Issues from Rider Solution-Analysis
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.50 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Download and install Rider 2. Wait a long time until the analysis has been completed. I excluded the `Presentation/Nop.Web/Plugins` folder from the analysis, as this is throwing many unnecessary and incorrect errors. After that, there are mainly two remaining issues: **<Presentation>\<Nop.Web>\Areas\Admin\Views\Setting\Forum.cshtml:3641 Tag 'section' not closed** https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/f4003005c8d8435ab3139d353257da32dbfadf6a/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Areas/Admin/Views/Setting/Forum.cshtml#L39-L55 **<Plugins>\<Nop.Plugin.Misc.Sendinblue>\Views\_ViewImports.cshtml:576 Cannot resolve symbol 'Areas'** Although, this seems to be already resolved in the current develop branch (partially at least): https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/f4003005c8d8435ab3139d353257da32dbfadf6a/src/Plugins/Nop.Plugin.Misc.Sendinblue/Views/_ViewImports.cshtml
